history.proof: intros p H1 H2. unfold is_prime. split. - intro. apply H1. apply divides_antisym. + sfirstorder depth: 3. + sfirstorder depth: 3. - intros d H3. hauto use: divides_refl unfold: is_gcd, is_cd.

original: intros p H1 H2. unfold is_prime. split. - intro. apply H1. apply H3. reflexivity. - intros d H3. apply prime_gcd with (a:=0); auto. apply H2. auto.
